actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain State and local taxes may be deducted by individuals only to the extent they exceed 1 percent of adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to limit an individual's deduction for State and local taxes to that amount of the taxes which exceeds one percent of the adjusted gross income of the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain State and local taxes may be deducted by individuals only to the extent they exceed 1 percent of adjusted gross income.
